content: the wonderful designer stella ackroyd has designed for us a beautiful asymmetrical triangular shawl inspired by the landscape that surrounds our hq the ruhner shawl begins with a simple garter stitch section and then flows into a simple lace pattern to keep things interesting it conjures up a similar feeling when driving to our hq surrounded by flat land it suddenly changes into a rugged landscape full of character this area is called the ruhner mountains and where the name of our shawl was born the blocked shawl wingspan measures 178 cm / 70 here are our yarn suggestions - **bc garn babyalpaca 10/2** rs 50g=250m/273yds **3 skeins** in shade 119ras or - **amano ayni** 50 g = 200 m / 219 yds **4 skeins** in shade 5015 or - **erika knight wool local** 100 g = 450 m / 492 yds **2 skeins** in shade 801 or - kremke soul wool **the merry merino 220** rs 50g=220m/240yds **4 balls** in shade 27
